==========
EEA Sparql
==========
EEA Sparql is a plone product for fetching data from Linked open data servers
(sparql endpoints).


.. contents::


Installation
============
  * Go to admin > Site Setup > Add-ons
  * Activate EEA Sparql


Usage
=====

* Within your working Folder add a Sparql or a Sparql Bookmarks Folder


Authors
=======

  EEA_ - European Environment Agency (EU)

.. _EEA: http://www.eea.europa.eu/
